member.summary: HIGHLY DISRECOMMENDED UNLESS COMMAND HAS NO USER INPUT, FOR SECURITY'S SAKE. Change the command type to a regular SQL statement. Vulnerable to SQL injection attacks.

member.summary: Append untrusted user input to the existing SQL command text. Should not be relied on for security of a SQL command. Does not escape text. Throws a SecurityException in case of detected suspicious character.
member.exception: Thrown if a disallowed sharacter sequence is detected.
member.param: The user input to append to the SQL command.
Whether or not to allow quotes in the user input string.
Whether or not to allow the world "OR" in the user input string.

member.name: T:Glib.UniqueRandom
member.summary: A random number generator generating only unique random numbers.

member.name: M:Glib.UniqueRandom.#ctor
member.summary: Create a new UniqueRandom random number generator.

member.name: M:Glib.UniqueRandom.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a new UniqueRandom random number generator with the specified seed.
member.param: The seed of the random number generator.

member.name: M:Glib.UniqueRandom.Reset
member.summary: Reset the list of generated numbers (integers, doubles, and bytes).

member.name: M:Glib.UniqueRandom.ResetInts
member.summary: Reset the list of generated integers.

member.name: M:Glib.UniqueRandom.ResetDoubles
member.summary: Reset the list of generated doubles.

member.name: M:Glib.UniqueRandom.Next(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generate a random unique number between the two specified values.
member.param: The inclusive lower bound of the number to be generated.
The exclusive upper bound of the number to be generated.
member.returns: A random number, unique within this instance, between the two specified values.

member.name: M:Glib.UniqueRandom.Next(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generate a random unique number lower than the specified maximum.
member.param: The exclusive upper bound of the number to be generated.
member.returns: A random number, unique within this instance, less than the specified value.

member.name: M:Glib.UniqueRandom.Next
member.summary: Generate a random, unique number.
member.returns: A random, unique number to this instance.

member.name: M:Glib.UniqueRandom.NextDouble
member.summary: Generate a random, unique double between 0.0 and 1.0.
member.returns: A random, unique double to this instance.

member.name: M:Glib.UniqueRandom.NextBytes(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Fill the elements of a specified array with bytes of non-unique random numbers.
member.param: An array of bytes to contain random numbers.
